bug.question: I am a little bug that wiggles and crawls on leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat green plants.
🦋 I can turn into a pretty butterfly!

bug.question: I make yummy honey. I fly around flowers. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I like to visit colorful plants.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. I am good luck! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🔴 I am often red or orange.
⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I hop and jump and like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.

bug.question: I build hills in the ground, and I am very strong for my size. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I work with lots of my friends.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than me.

bug.question: I fly around at night and like to go towards light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I come out when it's dark.

bug.question: I have long legs and build a web. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I eat flies and other insects.

bug.question: I am a beautiful bug that starts as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I buzz around your head, and sometimes bite! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I need water to lay eggs.

bug.question: I light up at night, like a tiny star! What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am also called a lightning bug.
💚 My light helps me find a friend.

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I can take your whole family.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks and carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I'm long and sometimes have a whistle.
👧👦 Many people ride me to different cities.
🛤️ I follow a special path made of metal.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people across the sea. What am I?
I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?
I am red and loud. I help put out fires. What am I?
I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You can ride me in the park.
🧑‍🦽 I need a kickstand to stand up.
hints.description: This hint has been corrected to be a more appropriate emoji.

hints.text: ⛑️ You should wear a helmet when you ride me.

transport.question: I take you to school and am yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🛑 I have a sign that says 'Stop'.

transport.question: I carry people high up, like a house that moves to the top of a mountain. What am I?

hints.text: 👀 You can see far from inside me.

transport.question: I'm a car that helps people who are sick or hurt get to the hospital. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren and flashing lights.
🏥 I bring people to get help.

transport.question: I fly to outer space! I can carry astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 People wear special suits when riding me.
